channel.title: Yeetcode
channel.itunes:author: Birat Koirala
channel.description: A small insight into the lives of people that are surrounded by technology day by day.

item.title: Who am I?
item.description: An introduction into the mind of the person who is running the podcast and what he aims to achieve with this podcast.

item.title: Technology, Uni Life and Saving the Planet
item.description:
In this episode, we look at a vast array of issues/discussions all around the world, but with a much more personal perspective. We dive into the past, present and future of the guests as they talk about their first encounters with technology, their current university life and future endeavours. Guests in this recording:
Abhishek Bhattarai Bisesh Sitaula Dara Agbola

item.title: Education, Purpose and Success
item.description:
In this episode, we explore how three people at very different stages in their life have the different experienced that they do. We look at limitations of education and exam systems in schools and institutions. We discuss how these limitations could be resolved. We proceed to discuss the purpose in life and what everyone thinks success is. Guests in this recording:
Ben Breen Abhay Pherali
